title: Scripting
body:
It seems to becoming more common. I came across a couple people in recent days using scripts. 
When you report someone for scripting, is it like other report categories where a number of reports is necessary before it's brought to Riot's attention?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm unsure on the specifics of the report system, whether or not every report is investigated or they require a certain number of reports to be investigated.

The best thing to do is to just report them as you see them.
